page.title: 01Summary of the Area
page.content: The D-block examined is predominately residential though as revealed in the land cover survey large areas are given over to farming, mostly dairy or cattle rearing. The block is bisected by the M4 motorway (east- west) and the River Tawe (north - south).Alongside the river at Ynysforgan a new by-pass is currently under construction. One of the most important features of the area is the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Centre, a major employer with approximately 5000 people working there. Good road links with the city of Swansea and an attractive outlook has meant expansion of housing in the area with new housing estates and a new school being completed within the last ten years.
